The 2000 term of the [[Supreme Court of the United States]] began October 2, 2000 and concluded September 30, 2001. The table illustrates which opinion was filed by each justice in each case and which justices joined each opinion.<ref>''[[Arizona v. California]]'', 531 U.S. 1 (2001), a decree in an original jurisdiction suit, has been omitted from this table.</ref>
